skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Skilled in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, I excel at creating visually engaging interfaces, enhancing user experience.

skills.title: React.js
skills.description: Proficient in React.js, I specialize in designing dynamic interfaces, significantly enhancing user experience.

portfolio.title: Queue Management System
portfolio.description: For this hospital management system, I've crafted a front-end interface tightly integrated with powerful APIs, enhancing operational efficiency and management capabilities.

portfolio.title: Facility Management System
portfolio.description: In this facility management system, I've designed a user-friendly interface to effortlessly oversee facility operations, making management tasks simple and efficient.

portfolio.title: Note Keeper Application
portfolio.description: In this note-keeping app, I've created a simple platform for jotting down and organizing your thoughts quickly and efficiently, making it easy to stay organized and productive.
